text: having won a salon here today I will be
cooking and western-influenced dish
called beef ragout it's probably brought
to Vietnam by the French because in
Vietnamese we called more ragout it's
quite similar to another dish called
Mahal or get me lips to that I make a

are nice or cinnamon which is your very
popular and basic ingredients like
tomato sauce and some stature vegetables

or Vietnamese spaghetti
so let's begin recipes the ingredients
you're gonna need our three Cabbot three
to four small potatoes 1 medium size
onion 1 cup of tomato ketchup you can
also use about 1/3 cup of tomato paste
instead one cannot bake it beans in

instead and another main ingredient is
of course the beef use the beef with
some fats or a tendon in it like beef
shank beef brisket or beef tongue is
also nice for this dish cut the beef
into 1 by 2 inch pieces and then season
with a tablespoon of minced garlic salt
sugar and chicken stock 1 teaspoon each
oh and don't forget some crack pepper
mix where I'll set aside for about
fifteen to thirty minutes make some
v-shaped incisions around the carrots
then slice into half-inch pieces then
you will have many pretty cuts of
kernels flowers
cut the potatoes into bite-sized pieces
try to cut in equal size so that they
can be cooked evenly
cut the onion into wedges and cut the
wedges in half now heat a lap pot on
medium-high and add tablespoon of
vegetable oil then add some minced
garlic and fry until fragrant
then toss in the beef and stir-fry until
the color changes
add a cup of tomato sauce and mix well
then asses cups or one and a half liters
of water today I add two cups of coconut
juice and four cups of water to make
this to more hearty you can also use
chicken broth if you like
then cover the lid and lower the heat
and cook for 45 minutes if you have a
pressure cooker then you just need to
cook for 15 minutes because the carrot
takes more time to cook we're gonna add
it in first
then cover and cook for ten minutes and
then add in the potatoes
cover and cook for another ten minutes
until soft finally at the onion and the
bacon beans and turn off the heat the
bacon beans are very soft already so
don't cook them any further otherwise
they will break and turn mushy in this
do now you want to have a taste and add
one to two more teaspoon of salt the
baking pins and the coconut juice are
